amendment.description: Amendment establishes a permanent "Deficit Reduction Lock-box" that would apply to this appropriations bill and to all future general appropriations bills.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, made in order pursuant to the rule and printed as amendment No. 2-3 of House Rept. 104-224 to establish a permanent "Deficit Reduction Lockbox" that would apply to this appropriations bill and to all future general appropriations bills under specific circumstances.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crapo amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 373 - 52 (Roll no. 613).
